website_summaries.verdict: With its solid yet attractive design and the ability to produce lots of fluffy ice quickly and efficiently, you won't find a better machine.
pros: Don't let the mid-level price fool you – this powerful, waterproof machine is engineered to produce up to 145 pounds
cons: Blade can be a bit challenging to adjust

customer_reviews.title: NOT FLUFFY SNOW
customer_reviews.text: I always check the reviews on a product before I make a purchase. I bought the Zeny ice shaver thinking my finished result was going to be a fluffy snowy texture. I was very dissappointed when large chunks started spitting out in more of a snow cone slushy type of ice. Maybe my blade isn't positioned right. It leaks a little bit so I would reccomend a towel under machine while using. The machine is very fast. If you are making snow cones this machine would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: It turns out like snow it is not to loud so glad I chose this one very much worth the money not very many solid ice pieces all snow
customer_reviews.author: Leslie gage

customer_reviews.title: I was eager to make some margaritas, so as ...
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to make some margaritas, so as soon as I received this I cleaned it out according to the directions. However it was obvious that there were large to medium metal shards in the ice even after washing the device out multiple times. I let the ice melt and there was about half an inch of metal shards at the bottom of the glass. I contacted the seller in regards to perhaps trading out my unit for another, however I have received no response and this piece of junk is sitting on my counter where it shall stay unused. PLEASE check for metal shards in your glasses!!
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase we have made! My kids love it and so do we! We also make our own syrup to put over the ice. Saves a lot of money doing it at home and is fast and easy. Ice does fly out a little but who cares it's only water. Definitely recommend! How to make sno cone syrup...... Boil 1 cup water then dissolve 2 cups sugar in it over low heat then dissolve one koolaid packet (flavor of your choice .24 cents in Walmart) pour into a bottle and let cool. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Makes excellent shaved ice!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews are mixed, but I have had no issues whatsoever with this. As other reviewers have noted, it takes a bit of the first batch of ice to bring the machine down to temperature. This hasn't been a big concern for me. I would recommend making sure to use very hard, solidly frozen ice. I have a countertop ice maker that I was thinking would be perfect to accompany this. Using the ice from that produces a chunkier, less satisfying shaved ice. Using ice that's been hardened in the freezer produces perfect, fluffy shaved ice. Kids absolutely love this. Very cheap way to have fun all summer long! I am very, very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Hardcore Ice cone Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - great value for the $ - this will last FOREVER! Shaves the ice SUPER thin which is what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: joe franko, jr

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for one of these for ages! It's so hard to find a snowcone machine that is affordable AND actually makes soft, fluffy snow! I have used it everyday none stop since I got it! So far no mechanical issues. only "issue" is the bowl that comes with doesn't catch the snow well. Eventually I will need to look into the possibility or probability of replacing the part of the machine that shaves the ice, but so far it is holding up to intense use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. Did a trial run. Works great so far. Easy to use. It is loud but I expected that from previous reviews so it didn’t bother me. Also used a large mixing bowl to catch the ice instead of what came with it so it didn’t make a mess. From previous reviews people were stating that the original bowl did not catch the ice or snow very well, but easy fix. For the money if it lasts a couple of summers I will be very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Needs some experimentation
customer_reviews.text: I wish that the "product manual" was actually helpful. It is poorly written and doesn't give enough info. I appreciate reading comments from other customers that give hints about how fast to push the ice through, but having an adjustment for coarseness on the machine would be nice. The ice we got was still not as fine as I would have liked. It does seem messy as the ice wants to overshoot the collection bowl. I wish it was easier to clean/dry after using. But it seems like a very heavy-duty machine that works quickly and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: HSMomof3

customer_reviews.title: SHAVES ICE PRETTY FAST. WITH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: STAR OF THE PARTY! THIS IS A MUST HAVE FOR ANY CHILDREN BIRTHDAY PARTY. SHAVES ICE PRETTY FAST. WITH THE PRICE, THIS IS A STEAL. HEAVY DUTY BUILD. WILL LAST A LONG TIME. I ALSO LIKE THE SAFETY FEATURE INCLUDED, IT WILL NOT GRIND UNTIL THE COVER IS LOWERED.
customer_reviews.author: sixto

customer_reviews.title: Please send customers NEW ITEMS!
customer_reviews.text: Item appears to be used which is very concerning given the current climate with Covid-19. I was very excited to receive the product early but there are paint/metal scratches in various places on the item. Very disappointed and will be seeking a refund!
customer_reviews.author: alicea powell

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase This Year!
customer_reviews.text: This deserves a ten, not just a five! Truly made of metal unlike all the others we have bought, makes small work of shaving ice, no matter what type of ice. Avoid the novelty style because they last maybe 60 days of regular use and they are plastic. This is an excellent choice if you’re serious about shaved ice.
customer_reviews.author: Olympia Jeff

customer_reviews.title: thoroughly enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: this machine is MOST THOROUGHLY ENJOYED by my children! and it is commonplace now for everyone to enjoy a snow-cone when friends come over. It does exactly what it is supposed to do -- grinds ice into fine slivers. Yes, you get a piece here and there that has to be chewed bc it is a little larger than the others, but it doesn't bother us. 2 negatives I would say are: the machine is quite loud - and it drips water all around the counter under it when it's being use. but neither of those are horrible! I would still buy it again! (we use the Torani syrups and every snow cone we make is delightful!)
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: One of my best Amazon purchases to date!
customer_reviews.text: Our family of 8 can spend upwards of $45 on snowcone outings- so this investment has been absolutely worth it! The machine makes wonderful soft snow, and does even better when you freeze a “disk” of ice instead of using ice cubes. (I found small ziploc containers that are the perfect circumference for the ice chute) We use Torani syrups, which means I can make completely guilt free sugar-free snowcones anytime I’d like!
customer_reviews.author: RachelB

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but arrived used.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sturdy, easy to use and pleasing to the eye. Arrived six days earlier than estimated. Cons: Ice flies out, water leaks all over my countertop after each use, and it seems as though I was given a used machine as there were significant scratches all over it (see photos). I wish It didn’t have so much wear n tear, but it gets the job done. I will be keeping an eye on the quality of the blade and provide update.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Does not shave ice as well after a month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: Does not shave ice as well after a month and a half. When my wife first got this, she loved it and used it several times a day. Now she says it doesn't shave the ice as fine and leaves larger chunks of ice.
customer_reviews.author: B Finfrock

customer_reviews.title: Buy It !!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this is probably one of the best purchases I've made this year. Customer service is so awesome. The first one came damage due to handling during shipping. The company was very quick to give a response, the second one was actually shipped I think overnight Express. This machine actually produces better shaved ice than what we actually buy from the ice cream truck. Another review is correct if the ice is slightly wet before placing it in the machine, the ice produced fluffier. It is company is tagged for future purchases. I may buy one for my church.
customer_reviews.author: Lulani88

customer_reviews.title: Snow fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: I beg to differ with one review. This little machine is awesome. The ice shaves just like snow ...fluffy and all. As a native New Orleanian, we love snowballs. I purchased this machine hoping to duplicate what we get bk home. It didn’t disappoint. I purchased flavored syrups from the original sno wizard and voila! It’s the real deal. If you hv kids they will love these.
customer_reviews.author: AmzPrimeVIP

customer_reviews.title: Ice Chunks Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It appeared used out of the box but I gave it a shot. It's very quick in grinding up ice, but all it did was spew large chunks of ice all over my kitchen. Using a hammer would get better results. A question mentioned adjusting the blade--the screws holding it in place are on the other side with no access aside from taking the whole thing apart that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: JKakitsubata

customer_reviews.title: Wow, easy to use and great output of ice
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this lightning fast, but it was zero set up, easy to use and made great consistency ice. When you first use the machine, the metal warms the ice a little and it makes a chunkier flake. After a couple rounds, the metal gets cold and produces a more fine “snow” consistency. It’s tougher to packed into and ice cream cone shape the fluffier it is, but we made it work, no problem. The only flaw is that I would like the bowl to go farther under the shaver piece. A lot goes through the crack and makes the counter wet. Overall, great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jen beams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaved Ice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome - super simple to use and makes fluffy snow like shaved ice super fast. I read reviews that said it makes a mess - yes it's a little messy but it's not horrible. The thing that's so great about this is you can make the ice quickly so no one has to wait very long to get their serving. We've used ice cubes straight from the tray and I've also frozen a larger block of ice. frankly it doesn't make a difference which you use - both make truly fluffy snow cones, not ice chips.
customer_reviews.author: stacy pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Would probably pick something different next time.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a little store model, that lasted for nearly 20 years, it was simple and easy for anyone to use. This one has many things that make me want something different for home/party use. First, the openly spinning cutting discs would make me wary around children. The output does not quite reach the dish, so you have to hold the dish off to the side to catch everything. You have to output in to the supplied dish and then scoop in to your serving cup/bowl, extra wasteful step. Lastly very fine shaved ice, I prefer mine a little more chunky. Otherwise it does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: kids loved this thing!
customer_reviews.text: For $65, this thing kept the kids enjoying snowcones all summer. Toward the end of the summer (and MANY snowcones later) I found the blade didn't shave any more, it was more like scraped, but good none-the-less. I'll look for a replacement blade, but even if I don't find one, it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best snowball machine I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly LOVE this machine! It's perfect for a home or sunday school class or a small school classroom with occasional treats. It does make that amazing, fresh, powdery like snow. That was the main thing I was looking for. Editing to day I am addicted to this ice! I can go through a 10lb bag of ice in a weekend. And that's just me eating ice! I have had weightloss surgery and I'm supposed to drink a lot of water a day. Since my stomach only holds 4oz, its hard to drink that much. So I eat shaved ice. It gets my water intake in like it's supposed to. So I love,love,love this ice shaver!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Snow cone express
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because my granddaughter wanted me make snow cones with a plastic Olaf snow cone machine. You could crank that thing for two days and end end up with a teaspoon of shaved ice. This item you plug in, drop s cup of cubes in the funnel, close the handle and you have enough shaved ice for two to three snow cones. Works great. Saved my sanity. You do get some water from on the table surface but after all it is ice.
customer_reviews.author: Globegood

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally opened the box and It’s great! Crushes ice perfect for Halo Halo! The only thing that bugs me is the tray. The crushed ice only spits 80% out onto the tray the 20% land straight down off the tray near the unit. Messy but it’s just water. ⚡️💥 Kinda lame design but I have to live with it cuz I missed the window to return the product. Note to self, don’t wait to open and test your Amazon impulse buys.
customer_reviews.author: GRACIE5555

customer_reviews.title: ... to the shaving of the ice to produce a fine and coarse shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: i wish there is adjustments to the shaving of the ice to produce a fine and coarse shaved ice. the small bowl is not convenient to use because it does not contain the shaved ice. i had to find a deeper bowl that fits the area and collects the shaved ice more compact. over all it is not a bad ice shaver. we are enjoying it though.
customer_reviews.author: magra

customer_reviews.title: A fun summer treat!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this ice shaving machine. The quality of the machine is what I noticed first just taking it out of the box. It is very sturdy and well made. No flimsy or "weak" feeling pieces or parts. The ice shaving process is very simple and the machine has safety features that I appreciate. So easy to clean and not so large a machine that storing it is a hassle. The grandkids thought it was a very special treat and I see this being a regular thing all summer! I'm glad I bought the machine and would recommend it to all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should pay for itself in one summer
customer_reviews.text: Really a decent design. It generates relatively good ice shavings for what you are paying for. It works best with larger ice cubes. If you have really small ice or the pebble ice it will just make a mess. We have even explore the option of making ice blocks using silicon molds and those seem to work the best. After using this for a summer I’m sure we have saved as much money as we would have spent going to local snowy places
customer_reviews.author: Hillfamily

customer_reviews.title: Best summer product :)
customer_reviews.text: I am so hooked on this thing. Yes it does make a bit of a mess but I put it on top of a towel and that solves the problem. One word of advice, don't think you can freeze a big cup of water to use as an ice block. There is a little sensor/pin thing that has to be closed to a certain degree for it to come on. If you want to make a small blocks to use make sure they are only 2" or so in height.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase!! I absolutely love this machine!! We have literally used it every single day since we purchased it and it really exceeded my expectations!! It’s so fast and being able to use ice directly from my freezer makes it simple!!! Living in the desert (Las Vegas) we’ve purchased a few different makers at the stores always to feel frustrated. I spent more on this one and can say 100% it’s well worth it and I would buy it again!! 💖💖💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked great a picnic where we had to make snow cones for over 100 people. It shaves the ice very quickly and kept the snow cone line moving at a fast pace. We orinigally considered renting a snow cone machine, but the rental price was more expensive than purchasing this machine. I'm so glad we decided to invest in this machine instead. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Overheated First Day of Use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's graduation party. When I received it in the mail, I immediately tried it out once, and it worked great. At the party, after making less than 10 shaved ice cones spread out over a couple of hours, the machine began smelling of burning plastic and the metal was blisteringly hot to the touch; it stopped working after that. Had we not unplugged it, I am sure it would have caught on fire. Our party was past the 30 day return window, so the few snow cones that were enjoyed that day were REALLY expensive. I am really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Snow cones are a summer staple for us, but every snow cone maker I have tried has either been too difficult to use, or breaks. I was using my blender, but it didn't make fluffy snow. This ice shaver doesn't great job turning regular ice cubes into a pile of frozen snow. Sure the snow can be a little icey, but I use small ice cubes and it helps with the crystal size. Easy to use and clean. Hopefully it lasts us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: it is amazing. if the ice is wet the ice doesn't shave as good. also the only thing i disliked was the small plate it came with to catch the ice. I have a salad bowl I got at target that works amazing though.over all it was an amazing buy. my entire family enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. Machine works great
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Contacted amazon and they refunded price. Machine still operated, and they said I could keep it. Ice shaver works well. Moving motor and mechanical aspects seem beefy. We bought a 22lb bag of ice. We bought syrup from Wally. We made probably a dozen snow cones, I bet I still have 2/3 bag of ice. Chewed through ice with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Contract/relax

customer_reviews.title: Nearly as good as the commercial shaved ice machine at my dad's restaurant!
customer_reviews.text: My dad owns a restaurant that also does shaved ice. This shaved ice machine produces almost snow like ice and is currently in my dad's restaurant as a backup in case his commercial machine breaks. Obviously it won't put out the quantity of ice the commercial machine does but the quality of the shaved ice is very close. Obviously not meant for commercial use but it will work in a pinch. VERY IMPRESSIVE for the price! I haven't had it long enough to speak about durability but based on first impressions I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We live out in the sticks, and the nearest snowball stand is like 45 minutes away. I was craving a snowball, and was desperate, so I ordered this. We used bagged ice, and my cravings were cured. The texture of the ice is closer to shaved and not at all crushed or chopped. Finding the right flavoring is the hardest part of the experience. Beware the blades are sharp...
customer_reviews.author: Gene Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good but unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Product does as described, and shaves ice well. Great for making snow-like cones. Parents: this product is extremely dangerous for small children. There is no safety and the blade is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: dcdBRHTX

customer_reviews.title: Use a mold for your ice!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great, but it does make a mess. Thereis one caveat. You need to use a mold for the ice for it to shave powder. If you use normal ice cubes it will not shave them as finely and you will end up with chunky ice.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for Christmas. She was so excited to use this. Took it out of the box, set it up, put in the ice, and nothing. Nothing happened. It turns on...but nothing happened. It doesn’t work. Right out of the box. Now I have a child in tears.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Well made, shaves large quantities of ice quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement this thing needs is to have a ‘U’ shape where the useless bowl sits, and make a larger dish that fits flush to the shaved ice spout. Wonderful machine. Extremely portable. Uses all sorts of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Ohsnap

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. We’ve used it a ton and it’s not even summer yet. I would suggest turning it off and on with switch instead of letting it shut off with safety shut off, less ice flying out:) It is heavy-ish for an appliance but it makes great shaved ice from the cubes you have in your freezer
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is an amazing value, does GREAT shaved ice, and is built like a tank. Other reviews say how it's not true shaved ice. It is, the trick is to be gentle when you push down into the ice, let the blade spin on its own then LIGHTLY press on the handle - much like pulsating a blender. I love this thing, and it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: The bowl really is pretty useless and where the ice shoots out makes a big mess and the angle is just completely off. However this is a fantastic machine that makes the most fluffy white snowy ice. If those were fixed it would be the perfect machine. So much fun to make snowballs to play with and even more delicious to make snow cones.
customer_reviews.author: FLMac

customer_reviews.title: I love shave ices!
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this machine from the first run. I was able to satisfy my craving for shave ices without having to go anywhere! The ice is perfect and I was able to get sugar free, calorie free syrups so I can indulge as often as I want! The machine is just a little bulky when trying to store it when not in use. Outside of that, I’m in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Nisotis

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction but difficult to get the ice directly in to cup.
customer_reviews.text: If you work at it you may be able to angle a cup up to the chute to catch the ice directly in the cup but it is not easy. Using the bowl they provide and then transferring the ice to your cups was just too much hassle for me. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Caster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those warm days
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to make snow cones/shaved ice. Works perfect. Grinds ice cubes to ice "snow." Would give a 5 as you have to continuously turn the metal bowl to capture all the ice snow coming from machine. Also suggest keeping towel nearby as some of the ice does not make it all to the bowl. Very sturdy and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Cortez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! When I received it and saw the ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! When I received it and saw the blade wasn't adjustable, I was afraid it might give me "Slushie" size ice chunks, but it really was perfect fluffy "snow cone" ice! I don't know who was happier.. the kids or the adult neighbors who received frozen alcohol beverages. Stock up on ice. Every piece in my house was in a shaved ice drink within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: James Greer

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is phenomenal! I've considered buying a small, cute, brightly colored machine. However, after reading all those reviews, I decided on this more industrial ice shaver. Best decision ever! This thing shaved ice into practically powder, and I've never had one hiccup to date.
customer_reviews.author: DRV

customer_reviews.title: A Total Winner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after purchasing a cheap plastic shaver and this oine kicks it to the curb with extreme prejudice. This shaver works brilliants and is beyond easy to use... just pop ice cubes in, flip the handle down, watch the magic happen. It's fast, powerful, and awesome... completely unlike the plastic imitations. If you're going to make more than two ice cube bags' worth of sno-cones do yourself a favor and buy a substantial unit like this.
customer_reviews.author: Buy Actual Cat Food Instead

customer_reviews.title: Great snow cones
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of equipment it makes great shaved ice. You have to use solid pieces of ice not ice cubes. You can use small plastic cups and fill up only half way depending on the size of cup. The machine has a safety switch that will not let you operate if door is too far open.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mandujano

customer_reviews.title: High quality and quieter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the machine. That said, it does make snow cone ice and doesn't really produce the snow-like shaved ice that the name of the machine might imply. It is easy to operate and has a nice safety feature in the handle. But the best part for me was the quietness. It makes a fair amount of noise, but nothing like I expected. I have used it to shave not only ice but frozen fruit without any trouble and it makes far less noise than a blender or food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Simply amazing...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as promised, packed perfectly so the unit was intact, super easy to use and most important.... super fluffy ice shavings. A little tip for anyone if you use ice from frozen watter bottles and you cut them in big chunks, your machine will work better than with small ice cubes. Enjoy your frozen drinks from now on the same way i will do mines... cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: carmen v.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite splurges
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now and it still creates fluffy snow like ice. Built like a tank (as another reviewer said). I use regular Sparkletts ice in it and it comes out fine. Using a several folded paper towels underneath will help easier clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago I bought a piece of equipment that I thought would give me shaved ice, but it was for crushed ice. This wonderful piece of equipment is actually for Hawaiian shaved ice. I love just eating the ice...no flavors or flavoring. It's really great and so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Snoopy Snow Cone machine for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who spent their childhood manually cranking the Snoopy Snow cone machine for 1/4 cup ice an hr will appreciate the ease and quickness of the Zeny ice shaver. Works great so far, sharp and powerful, so keep your fingers away.
customer_reviews.author: JCobb

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this to come and have now used it about 3 times. Don't get me wrong, the product is awesome... when it works. The problem is, sometimes when I turn it on it does nothing. I have to keep unplugging it and moving the cord and then it will randomly decide to work again. This is putting me in a tough situation because I have an important event coming up that will require this machine. Now I have to stress about either replacing it and risk not having it in time or keeping it and having it not work properly. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica3girls

customer_reviews.title: Just like at the snowball shops in New Orleans
customer_reviews.text: Makes great snowballs! Longed for a snowball shop like when I was a kid growing up in New Orleans, and this machine is just about the same. I love how sturdy it is and that it will last for generations to come. The ice is shaved and not crushed. Feel great, melts perfectly in your mouth. Perfectly refreshing for kid syle snowballs and grownup style ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great Snowballs
customer_reviews.text: coming from Baltimore where snowballs are a summer must, I can say this little machine is awsome. It can knockout a snow ball in seconds. The way the ice is crushed is perfect. It is well made and safe and easy to use. It paid for itself at my first family get together. At 52 bucks it was a steal. Amazon got it to me in two days. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Horney Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually pretty decent. I bought it to make the Korean shaved ice. It's shaves it down pretty fluffy. I froze milk and that shaves down really well. Not the safest thing, just keep it away from kids and don't stick your hand in the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast of a machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast it is much bigger and heavier than I expected and completely made out of metal with a cover for the blade that cruches the ice so it's super safe so long as kids dont put their hand inside of the hole and shreds the ice in seconds with just a couple of ice cubes I was able to fill up a pretty big cup i want to say maybe a 13oz so definitely well worth the money it is however very loud like you definitely cant use it in the middle of the night you might wake the whole block up kind of loud but otherwise a very very well made machine
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy, easy to use product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I ordered this after returning a more "cutesy" snoe cone machine twice because it wasn't working properly. This came with no assembly required which was awesome to be able to make snow cones as soon as it was opened without reading a whole assembly and instructions manual. It's simple, straightforward, and easy to use. I love that it has a safety feature of stopping the blade when the handle is opened. It also shaves the ice at amazing lighting speed!
customer_reviews.author: Khelsie

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Can use your own ice & it shreds it fast! You'll need to flip it upside down to dry & put it on top of a towel when in use to catch any stray ice that may fall.on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!  You’ll thank yourself.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic summer buy. My kids use this everyday. The ice is great. Professional type of ice not the hard grainy cheap kind. It’s like snow. The shaver is so easy even my 8 year old can operate it safely. It saves the ice in lightning speed. Highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Q V R

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So much Better than the cheap plastic ones we have used in the past. We have used this a lot in the past year and it is great. It works best if you can freeze a bigger container rather than just ice cubes. A small sour cream container works great!
customer_reviews.author: ExtremeLearningGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that the end product would be powdery and not icey and I was VERY happy with the results. I have used it on several occasions and it always produces a consistent result. Great for drinks in the summertime. It is so fast too. Great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: valmic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It arrived much earlier than expected. I've been using it almost every day for about a month and it works great! The tray is too small but I just use a cookie sheet to catch the shaved ice and it works fine and helps prevent splatters. Great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W. Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Marry me
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life. I love this thing, i just wished I used it more. need a margarita, BAM give me 10 seconds; That's pulling it out of a cabinet, plugging it in, putting ice in it, and shaving the heck out of it. Great great machine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lorenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My son loves shaved ice....not flavored snow cones but shaved plain ice. I got this for his 9th birthday and it is durable, makes great ice. The slower you press handle, the finer the ice. Also of you use bigger ice pieces, the ice is finer. Only thing i wish i had was a case or something to store it in. We keep it outside covered with a towel.
customer_reviews.author: MILANI

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thing. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This thing cranks through ice in so fast. It's really fun to use. The shaved is very light and fluffy. It's very big and heavy, but I like the way it looks on my kitchen counter. It is overbuilt for the task. Makes a very loud noise, but what do you expect, it's like a wood-chipper for ice! I was not expecting a power tool for the kitchen, but I am very happy with it. I am going to see if I can make enough shaved ice for a snowball fight...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the cheap snow cone machines.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good really shaves down the ice very fine and makes great snow cones. The jury is still out when it comes to the durability, although it seems well-built, however though no complaints at this time. I think it will be worth the extra money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - faulty design
customer_reviews.text: The ice shute is curved rather than straight into the bowl. This makes the crushed ice fly everywhere but in the bowl that comes. With the unit...it was a mess to use even when I tried a deeper bowl tipped to provide a higher side where the ice Shute is aimed
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this machine to replace an all plastic unit which ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine to replace an all plastic unit which lasted about two weeks. does throw out a bit of ice which putting a towel helps. But performs very well.
customer_reviews.author: George Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT EVER !!
customer_reviews.text: BEST GIFT EVER, legit use is SEVERAL times a day). My mom purchased this for me for my birthday, I am a heavy crushed ice eat. I normally eat ice from racetrac, QT, and Zaxby’s, but I LOVE more of a shaved ice taste. This is PERFECT! I realized the slower you crush the thinner (more snow like) the ice is, the faster the more of the chunks (like snow cone or slushy) the ice is. My only con (and reason for 4 stars instead of 5) is that the machine leaks so I have to constantly keep a towel under and swap it out after a few uses because it’s wet.
customer_reviews.author: Black Family

customer_reviews.title: Saddest disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: This item was an ices shaver that didn’t shave the ice to its lightest form and for the cost!!!! I was sadly disappointed. It looked so much like snow but was actually shaved ice not lite like cotton candy smooth either.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Little Tank
customer_reviews.text: I Love this little machine... Makes beautiful fluffy snow. I was a little worried reading some of the reviews, but this thing is built like a tank... Very durable I've had it for a week and I use it every day...I love to chew ice, but i was worried about ruining my teeth, That's why I bought this...the ice is soft , fluffy snow...not worried about my teeth anymore...the only mildly annoying thing is that it leaves the counter all wet... But that's to be expected...just put a dish towel under it...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use, portable, and works great. I took it to a picnic at a park and had no problems with it. No ice got stuck in the blades and there was basically no clean up. We did not use the ice tray. We just put cups directly under the machine to fill. In terms of safety, I turned it off when not immediately in use or when filling it with more ice.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: After trying some either hard to use or cranking style ice cone makers this one is amazing! Works fast with great texture and softness. A tad messy but once you get use to it and move the bowl around while it’s working it isn’t too bad. Highly recommend! Also cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: The best shaved ice!
customer_reviews.text: Super finely shaved ice. Smooth and delish! Not the chunky crushed kind a lot of snow cone machines make. We put a larger bowl up to the spout and rotate it as the shavings shoot out. The bowl they provide is really small
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is really quick at shaving ice. I just wish it was easier to catch the ice and make more shaved ice. The bowl it came with fills very quickly. However you can shave a ton of ice very fast and because it is not too big it is easy to find a place to store it.
customer_reviews.author: T DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Broke after several uses
customer_reviews.text: motor gave out after 3 weeks of usage. do not purchase this ice shaver
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun purchase! Perfectly shaves ice. Works best with ice that's more frozen. If ice gets a little melty it's more like crushed ice, harder frozen and it shaves like snow!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The shaved ice is finer than snow cone ice but not to the same ...
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy duty and can handle volumes of ice but it does not shave the ice as finely as we had hoped. The shaved ice is finer than snow cone ice but not to the same fluffiness of real Hawaiian shaved ice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow cones!
customer_reviews.text: This ice shaver has become a fixture for our family night each week. It's durable and makes nicely shaved ice, perfect for snow cones. I am so glad we bought this. It is has way better quality than most of the ice shavers you see in stores.
customer_reviews.author: cdwickli

customer_reviews.title: Decent snowcone maker
customer_reviews.text: This product is very messy but makes ice great for chunky snowcone. If you're looking for snow like ice you're better with a different product. Not a bad buy but if I knew the ice wasnt gonna be small and fluffy I wouldn't have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie B.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We were spending quite a bit of money on snow cones at our local store. This shaver makes shaved ice in seconds. We love the fact we can now make shaved ice at home to save money. This will definitely be used even more this summer. It is easy to use and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 2 more as gifts after owning mine a year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice shaver about a year ago & it still works wonderfully! It works so well that i have bought a total of 3; the original one i bought for myself & 2 more to give as gifts for my sisters because they loved mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt

customer_reviews.title: A must buy in the summer for snow cones , slushees, and good iced tea
customer_reviews.text: Great snow cone maker from this ice-crusher easy to use by an adult but please think safety when using. The unit is sharp and heavy. It looks like it’s going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: budblitz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product Good Value
customer_reviews.text: ..it brings back memories of an earlier time of when we used to go get all those nice sno-cones! Use the syrup and throw those ice cubes in and you have some good treats! Love it..........
customer_reviews.author: Amy Madragana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy and makes perfect "snow" ice
customer_reviews.text: This ice shaver delivers perfect "snow" ice for drinks, snow cones, shakes, whatever. Very heavy which is not a bad thing because it doesn't move around when you are using it. A bit noisy and messy (ice sprays somewhat) but does a great job. I really like this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halo-halo
customer_reviews.text: Wife told me she wanted an ice shaver for Christmas to make Halo-halo. This thing is heavy, seems very well built, and turns ice to snow in a few seconds. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Stop your look is over
customer_reviews.text: The best ice crusher I’ve ever own. It is quick and easy a little messy but it’s good. Before I get a message asking how dose it cut or shave the ice don’t know how to answer that but it’s perfect it melts in your mouth but there’s still a crunch but it doesn’t melt too fast. This ice shaver does not take forever this one is quick and like I said earlier the best I shaver I’ve ever own.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great shaved ice for icy drinks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make snow cones for the grandkids and it is perfect! I would not let them use it as it does have a blade in it but it is easy to use and is a quality product! Look forward to many happy years of yummy snow cones!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Temple

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It’s great for anytime use Especially making Halo Halo!! My wife and I are very glad that we found and bought this Zeny Ice Shaver machine!! We used to go for a drive for about an hour just to buy halo halo and pay $6.00. Now we can just make it our own anytime we want!!! Easy to clean and easy to use!!! Worth the money to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buenafe

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is well built and shaves ice well. It does not shave it as fine as italian ice but with care it produces very a very fine result.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Definately industerial strength. Works perfectly. Snow balls aren't just for eating, shave up enough and the kids can have snow ball battles in the summer time. What a great treat!
customer_reviews.author: dancingdream

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halo Halo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great for making Halo Halo 🇵🇭
customer_reviews.author: Sherwinjune79

customer_reviews.title: Makes great snow!
customer_reviews.text: We got this machine for my daughters birthday party and we absolutely love it! We’ve used another machine and it was so difficult to get the blade that shaved the ice “just right” but this one requires no skill and is fast:) it makes the perfect texture of snow for shaved ice.
customer_reviews.author: JacknBri

customer_reviews.title: Ice destroyer !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought it would be but VERY powerful . Make perfect snow ice . You can use any kind of ice from cubes to what we used were Dixie cups and made small blocks . It will absolutely shave it away in seconds !!! Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ZENY Ice Shaver Machine Electric Snow Cone Maker Stainless Steel Shaved Ice Machine 145lbs Per Hour (Orange)
product_meta.description:
Color:OrangeThere is nothing like having a refreshing snow cone with your favorite flavors in the hot summary days. It can be an even more satisfying tradition from the comfort of your own home! Do not hesitate to buy it now! 
There is nothing like having a refreshing snow cone with your favorite flavors while the sun is beaming down on your back. It can be an even more satisfying tradition from the comfort of your own home!

FEATURES:
Brand New And Solid Durable Frame
Stainless Steel Shaving Blade For Higher Shaving Speed 
Powered By Electricity, It Is Able To Produce 143 lbs Of Shaved Ice Per Hour To Meet Demands Of Large Amount Of Ice In A Short Time
Suitable For Home Made Delicious Slush Ddrink, Snow Cone, Or A Mixed Drink At Anytime With Ease At Home
Widly Applicated To Business,Restaurant, School Organizations, Festival Commercial Uses 
Manual Stainless Steel Holding bowl Is Easy To Clean


Stable Heavy Cast Base: To operate the machine, sometimes it will bring about some vibration because of the highly spinning shaving shade. Anodized Aluminum Hopper: Aluminum is employed in the manufacture of the hopper so that the product can stand years of use and guard against rust. Easy cleaning as well. Sharp Alloy Steel Shaving Blade: This can assure swifter shaving speed and durable for years of use. 

Specification
Rotated Speed: 1400 runs/min
Shaving Capacity: 143 lbs/h ( 65kg/h )
Voltage: 110V
Power: 300W
Frequency: 60Hz 


What's in the box
1x ZENY Ice Shaver Crusher
1x Manula enclosed
feature_bullets: ✦ Versatile Functional Utilities - Not only suitable for home use to make and taste slush & drinks anytime handily, also widely ideal for producing hand-made slush & frozen drinks for commercial use, such as fast-food stores, snack bars, cafes, school canteens, clubs, restaurants, carnivals, banquets or festivals.One device serves up to different needs with high efficiency

✦ Well Built Quality & Eye-catching Shape -All stainless steel waterproof construction stands years of use and guard against rust, sleek elegant clean apperance makes it a unique and attractive addition to your kitchen collection

✦ High Effency & Fast Speed - Highly efficient motor can produce 143 lbs of shaved ice per hour to meet demands of large amount of ice in a relatively short time.A Commercial grade Stainless steel shaving blade provide softer finer ice, rust resistant, environmental-friendly varnished yield healthy, large amount of fluffy snow ice. A kitchen MUST snow cone truck with great value

✦ 100% Safety Material - Heavy cast base offer fully stable workstation to ensure vibration and noise will be deducted to the lowest degree, water-resistant on/ off switch is easy to control,it will automatically cuts off when hopper handles in open, guarantees its safe operation to avoid any wound or injure
✦ Easy to Operate & Easy to Clean - Ergonomically design for simple operation, a given Food grade stainless steel bowl is for convenient serving, easy to clean after each use, energy and time saving
